statements: SELECT * FROM CropYieldData WHERE region_name = 'North'
SELECT crop_type, yield_amount FROM CropYieldData WHERE yield_amount > 100
SELECT region_name, crop_type FROM CropYieldData ORDER BY yield_amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT region_name FROM CropYieldData
SELECT * FROM CropYieldData WHERE crop_type IN ('Wheat', 'Rice')
SELECT region_name, crop_type, yield_amount FROM CropYieldData WHERE region_name='North' ORDER BY crop_type ASC, yield_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM CropYieldData WHERE crop_type='Rice' ORDER BY yield_amount DESC
SELECT region_name, MAX(yield_amount) AS max_yield FROM CropYieldData GROUP BY region_name HAVING max_yield > 5000
SELECT region_name, AVG(yield_amount) AS avg_yield FROM CropYieldData GROUP BY region_name ORDER BY avg_yield DESC
SELECT DISTINCT region_name FROM CropYieldData
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE region = 'North'
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data ORDER BY yield_amount DESC
SELECT crop_id, crop_name FROM crop_yield_data WHERE crop_id > 3
SELECT region, avg_yield_amount FROM region_data WHERE total_crops > 50 ORDER BY avg_yield_amount ASC
SELECT region_name, total_crops FROM region_data
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE region='North' ORDER BY yield_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data WHERE crop_id=3;
SELECT region, avg_yield_amount, total_crops FROM region_data WHERE avg_yield_amount > 50 ORDER BY total_crops ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_crops, AVG(yield_amount) AS avg_yield FROM crop_yield_data;
SELECT region_name, SUM(total_crops) AS total_crops FROM region_data GROUP BY region_name HAVING total_crops > 1000;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data;
SELECT region_id, crop_type, yield_kg FROM crop_yield_data WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, location FROM region_info WHERE region_id = 3;
SELECT MAX(yield_kg) AS max_yield FROM crop_yield_data;
SELECT region_id, COUNT(*) AS crop_count FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY region_id ORDER BY crop_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_kg > 500 ORDER BY yield_kg DESC;
SELECT region_name, location FROM region_info WHERE region_id IN (1,3,5);
SELECT crop_type, AVG(yield_kg) AS avg_yield FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY crop_type;
SELECT region_id, trend_type FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_type LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY region_id ASC;
SELECT region_info.region_name, crop_yield_data.crop_type, crop_yield_data.yield_kg FROM region_info INNER JOIN crop_yield_data ON region_info.region_id = crop_yield_data.region_id;
SELECT * FROM region;
SELECT region_name FROM region WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, crop_season FROM crop WHERE crop_id > 5;
SELECT yield_amount, yield_date FROM yield WHERE yield_id = 3 AND region_id = 2;
SELECT trend_analysis FROM trend ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM region WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM crop WHERE crop_name LIKE '%rice%';
SELECT region_name, crop_name, yield_amount FROM region JOIN yield ON region.region_id = yield.region_id JOIN crop ON crop.crop_id = yield.crop_id WHERE yield_amount > 100;
SELECT trend_analysis FROM trend WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT region_name, COUNT(yield_id) AS total_yield FROM region LEFT JOIN yield ON region.region_id = yield.region_id GROUP BY region_name HAVING total_yield > 5;
SELECT * FROM regions
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM regions
SELECT region_name FROM regions WHERE region_id = 1
SELECT * FROM regions ORDER BY region_name DESC
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM regions WHERE region_id > 1
SELECT * FROM regions ORDER BY region_name DESC
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM regions WHERE region_id > 2
SELECT DISTINCT region_name FROM regions
SELECT region_name FROM regions WHERE region_id = 1 OR region_id = 3
SELECT COUNT(region_id) AS total_regions FROM regions
